wikipedia_page.main: Arnold Williams (30 September 1890 – 1 January 1958) was a British businessman and Liberal politician.

response: *Arnold Williams (1898–1970), American politician, Governor of Idaho
* Arnold Williams (American politician), Governor of Idaho
* Arnold Williams (British politician), British businessman and Liberal politician
* Arnold Williams (cricketer), Welsh-born cricketer for New Zealand

He entered politics in 1924, as the Conservative candidate for Sowerby in West Yorkshire. Sowerby was a historically Liberal seat, but the appearance of Labour candidates since 1918 had made it possible for Conservatives to win in a three-way fight. Shaw won the seat on a vote of just under 38%, ahead of the Liberal incumbent, Arnold Williams, on 32% and Arthur Dawson for Labour on 30%.
